translations: 拥抱；包含（embrace 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: His hospitality was instantaneous and all-embracing.
I intend to use these terms in a deliberately nonspecific and all-embracing way.
sentences.translation: 我意欲含糊笼统地使用这些词汇。

sentences.sentence: They end up embracing a different error.
sentences.translation: 他们最终接受了另一种错误。
